protein.specific_function: Cell surface adhesion protein. Mediates the adherence of lymphocytes to endothelial cells of high endothelial venules in peripheral lymph nodes. Promotes initial tethering and rolling of leukocytes in endothelia

reference.reference_text: Siegelman MH, Weissman IL: Human homologue of mouse lymph node homing receptor: evolutionary conservation at tandem cell interaction domains. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1989 Jul;86(14):5562-6.
